description technical detail:
Lenovo ThinkVision LT1953 19 inch LED Backlit LCD Monitor - Black
For users seeking a reliable and eco-friendly monitor with high performance at a great value, Lenovo provides ThinkVision LT1953 monitor. This monitor delivers rich color and vivid images on its 19-inch widescreen HD panel with LED backlight.
